dc:title: Fall Appeal - November 1957
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Lists various answers to the question "What does the Catholic Worker mean?" Says we all need to begin with ourselves in learning to give of ourselves. Keywords: poverty, family, pacifism, anarchism
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 730 1957-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
